mapper.select: select day, category, toDo, check_status from ToDoList where id = 'enshu' order by day desc
select check_status, category, toDo, from ToDoList where id = 'enshu' AND to_char(day, 'YYMMdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMdd') order by day desc
select category, toDo, check_status, day, do_id from ToDoList where id = 'enshu' AND day = #{_parameter} order by day desc
mapper.insert: insert into ToDoList (id, do_id, day, category, toDo) values ('enshu', seq_ToDoList.nextval, #{day}, #{category}, #{toDo})
mapper.update: update ToDoList set id = #{id}, day= #{day}, category = #{category}, toDo = #{toDo}, where do_id = #{id}
